rules.description: caps_lock on apple keyboards to left_control/escape
left_control on apple keyboards to hyper
grave_accent_and_tilde on US apple keyboards to hyper/grave_accent_and_tilde
non_us_backslash on non US apple keyboards to hyper/grave_accent_and_tilde

to.shell_command: open -g "rectangle-pro://execute-layout?name=layout1"
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} resize_window_left_half; else ${glazedc}.swift resize_window_left_half; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} resize_window_center; else ${glazedc}.swift resize_window_center; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} resize_window_maximize; else ${glazedc}.swift resize_window_maximize; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} resize_window_right_half; else ${glazedc}.swift resize_window_right_half; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} focus_window_left; else ${glazedc}.swift focus_window_left; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} focus_window_left; else ${glazedc}.swift focus_window_left; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} focus_window_right; else ${glazedc}.swift focus_window_right; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} focus_window_right; else ${glazedc}.swift focus_window_right; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} move_window_to_space 1; else ${glazedc}.swift move_window_to_space 1; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} move_window_to_space 2; else ${glazedc}.swift move_window_to_space 2; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} move_window_to_space 3; else ${glazedc}.swift move_window_to_space 3; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} move_window_to_space 4; else ${glazedc}.swift move_window_to_space 4; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} move_window_to_space 5; else ${glazedc}.swift move_window_to_space 5; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} move_window_to_space 6; else ${glazedc}.swift move_window_to_space 6; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} move_window_to_space 7; else ${glazedc}.swift move_window_to_space 7; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} move_window_to_space 8; else ${glazedc}.swift move_window_to_space 8; fi
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} move_window_to_space 9; else ${glazedc}.swift move_window_to_space 9; fi
open -g "rectangle-pro://execute-layout?name=layout1"
glazedc=${HOME}/.local/bin/glazed; if [ -e ${glazedc} ]; then ${glazedc} compile; else ${glazedc}.swift compile; fi
open https://stackoverflow.com
